str2: The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
The moon. From selas; the moon.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
A star. Probably from the base of stronnumi; a star, literally or figuratively.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A star. Probably from the base of stronnumi; a star, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dia and phero; to bear through, i.e. transport; usually to bear apart, i.e. to toss about; subjectively, to 'differ', or surpass.
A star. Probably from the base of stronnumi; a star, literally or figuratively.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
